subject.description: Young woman with a tanned complexion and sun-kissed skin texture. She has long, wavy, dirty blonde hair with lighter highlights and darker roots, parted in the middle and falling over her shoulders. She is wearing a black, textured (crinkle fabric) bikini. The bikini top is a triangle style connected by a central gold O-ring and has thin straps with gold ring hardware at the shoulders. The bikini bottoms are matching textured black fabric with gold O-rings at the hips. She wears a thin gold chain necklace and has a silver belly button piercing. Her physique is fit and toned with a defined waistline.
subject.anatomical_fidelity: The subject features a full, voluminous bust with significant mass and forward projection. Breast weight must be visually apparent, showing natural gravity and depth greater than the ribcage depth. Do not flatten, compress, or minimize chest volume. The torso is lean with visible abdominal definition. Skin texture shows natural pores, slight imperfections, and a shiny, high-specular finish indicative of sunscreen or natural oils.
subject.face: Oval face shape, neutral to slightly serious expression, direct gaze looking straight at the viewer. Soft features with full lips and a straight nose. Natural makeup look with emphasis on glowing skin.

pose.description: Seated on a grey mesh lounge chair. The body is angled slightly to the viewer's left, while the head is turned to face forward directly. The torso leans back slightly, supported by the left arm which is extended back to grip the edge of the chair. The shoulders are relaxed but square. The legs are positioned with the right leg extended forward towards the bottom left of the frame and the left leg bent at the knee.
pose.specifics: Weight distributed on the buttocks and left hand. Natural spine curvature consistent with a seated, leaning-back posture.

elements: Grey mesh sun lounger/chaise lounge with a dark metal frame
Grey interlocking paver stone patio floor
White vinyl privacy fence in the background
Green leafy bushes/shrubs situated between the chair and the fence
environment.context: Bright, sunny daytime setting in a backyard or pool area.

camera.shot_type: Medium shot (thighs up to top of head).
camera.angle: Eye-level to slightly high angle, looking slightly down at the torso to emphasize depth.
camera.depth_of_field: Sharp focus on the subject, slightly softer focus on the background fence.
camera.framing: Centered composition with the subject dominating the frame.

lighting.direction: From the upper right (viewer's perspective), casting distinct shadows to the left.
lighting.characteristics: High contrast sunlight creating strong specular highlights on the forehead, shoulders, chest, and thighs. Shadows are sharp and dark, defining the muscle tone and facial structure.

mood_and_expression.expression: Neutral, alluring, direct eye contact with a calm demeanor.

style_and_realism.fidelity: 1:1 photorealism focusing on texture and physical accuracy.
style_and_realism.rendering: Unreal Engine 5 level detail or high-end DSLR photography raw output.

colors_and_tone.palette: Natural skin tones (tan/bronze), matte black (bikini), vibrant green (foliage), bright white (fence), neutral grey (stone/chair).
colors_and_tone.contrast: High contrast due to direct sun.

quality_and_technical_details.texture_quality: Ultra-high, emphasizing skin pores and fabric weave.

aspect_ratio_and_output.cropping: No cropping allowed that removes anatomical volume.

depth_control.purpose: Depth, volume, and camera-to-body spatial lock

forbidden_concepts: tightened, lifted, or artificially supported breasts
